code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/admin/Desktop/untitled folder/bo_react_test/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{TRADING}from"../../constants";import config from"../../config";const initState={pair:config.default_pair,userPairList:[]};const tradingReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case TRADING.CHANGE_PAIR:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{pair:action.payload});case TRADING.ADD_USER_PAIR_LIST:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{userPairList:[...state.userPairList,action.payload]});case TRADING.UPDATE_USER_PAIR_LIST:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{userPairList:action.payload});case TRADING.DELETE_FROM_USER_PAIR_LIST:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{userPairList:state.userPairList.filter(el=>el.slug!==action.payload)});default:return state;}};export default tradingReducer;
